## isType() function

Type-guard that asserts that a given value is a Type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isType(value: unknown): value is Type<unknown>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type    | Description |
| --------- | ------- | ----------- |
| value     | unknown |             |

**Returns:**

value is [Type](./types.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;unknown&gt;
